00017 =head1 NAME
00018 
00019 contextPeriodic.pl - [DEPRECATED] Features added to Real and Complex 
00020 MathObjects classes.
00021 
00022 =head1 DESCRIPTION
00023 
00024 This file is no longer needed, as these features have been added to the
00025 Real and Complex MathObject classes.
00026 
00027 =head1 USAGE
00028 
00029     Context("Numeric");
00030     $a = Real("pi/2")->with(period=>pi);
00031     $a->cmp         # will match pi/2, 3pi/2 etc.
00032 
00033     Context("Complex");
00034     $z0 = Real("i^i")->with(period=>2pi, logPeriodic=>1);
00035     $z0->cmp        # will match exp(i*(ln(1) + Arg(pi/2) + 2k pi))
00036 
00037 =cut
00038 
00039 1;
00040
